name: v0.10.2
body:
## What's Changed
* Simple attempt to fix apt issues in pixi CI by @S-Dafarra in https://github.com/robotology/osqp-eigen/pull/200
* Add OSQP_EIGEN_OSQP_TARGET_TO_LINK CMake variable by @traversaro in https://github.com/robotology/osqp-eigen/pull/201
* Bump version to 0.10.2 by @traversaro in https://github.com/robotology/osqp-eigen/pull/202


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/robotology/osqp-eigen/compare/v0.10.1...v0.10.2

name: v0.10.1
body:
## What's Changed
* Fix definition of OsqpEigen::Status::TimeLimitReached in osqp >= 1 by @traversaro in https://github.com/robotology/osqp-eigen/pull/190
* Add basic Bazel integration, CI and docs by @traversaro in https://github.com/robotology/osqp-eigen/pull/191
* Add duality gap termination check configuration by @ethanmusser in https://github.com/robotology/osqp-eigen/pull/192
* Bump version to 0.10.1 by @traversaro in https://github.com/robotology/osqp-eigen/pull/194

## New Contributors
* @ethanmusser made their first contribution in https://github.com/robotology/osqp-eigen/pull/192

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/robotology/osqp-eigen/compare/v0.10.0...v0.10.1

name: v0.10.0
body:
## What's Changed

* Support building v0.6.3, v1.0.0.beta1 and v1.0.0 and bump version to 0.10.0 by @traversaro in https://github.com/robotology/osqp-eigen/pull/189


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/robotology/osqp-eigen/compare/v0.9.0...v0.10.0

name: osqp-eigen v0.9.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Make the code compatible with OSQP v1.0.0 by @gergondet in https://github.com/robotology/osqp-eigen/pull/131
* Do not run try_compile if OSQP_IS_V1 is already defined by @traversaro in https://github.com/robotology/osqp-eigen/pull/145
* Uniform the style of the code in the library by @GiulioRomualdi in https://github.com/robotology/osqp-eigen/pull/144
* Fix compatibility of OSQP 1 when using Windows by @traversaro in https://github.com/robotology/osqp-eigen/pull/163
* Fix typos by @cybaol in https://github.com/robotology/osqp-eigen/pull/166
* Avoid non-deterministic QPUnitTests failure by setting `polish` to true in QPUnitTests by @traversaro in https://github.com/robotology/osqp-eigen/pull/172
* General CI cleanup November 2024 by @traversaro in https://github.com/robotology/osqp-eigen/pull/171
* Fix some compiler warnings by @pauldreik in https://github.com/robotology/osqp-eigen/pull/179
* Bump action/cache to version 4 by @GiulioRomualdi in https://github.com/robotology/osqp-eigen/pull/183
* Bump actions/download-artifact from 2 to 4.1.7 in /.github/workflows by @dependabot in https://github.com/robotology/osqp-eigen/pull/170
* Release 0.9.0 by @traversaro in https://github.com/robotology/osqp-eigen/pull/185

## New Contributors
* @gergondet made their first contribution in https://github.com/robotology/osqp-eigen/pull/131
* @cybaol made their first contribution in https://github.com/robotology/osqp-eigen/pull/166
* @pauldreik made their first contribution in https://github.com/robotology/osqp-eigen/pull/179
* @dependabot made their first contribution in https://github.com/robotology/osqp-eigen/pull/170

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/robotology/osqp-eigen/compare/v0.8.1...v0.9.0

name: osqp-eigen v0.8.1
body:
# osqp-eigen v0.8.1 (2023-08-01) Release Notes

## What's Changed
* Update catch2 to v2.13.9 and osqp to v0.6.3 in CI by @traversaro in https://github.com/robotology/osqp-eigen/pull/133
* Missing include when compiling with MSVC 2022 by @enricodetoma in https://github.com/robotology/osqp-eigen/pull/130

## New Contributors

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/robotology/osqp-eigen/compare/v0.8.0...v0.8.1

name: osqp-eigen v0.8.0
body:
# osqp-eigen v0.8.0 (2022-11-21) Release Notes

## What's Changed
* make osqp-eigen cmake fetch friendly by @mhubii in https://github.com/robotology/osqp-eigen/pull/117
* Import AddUninstallTarget.cmake from YCM v0.14.1 to fix compilation with ninja by @traversaro in https://github.com/robotology/osqp-eigen/pull/120
* Install catch2 on macOS CI and fix the tag of m.css by @GiulioRomualdi in https://github.com/robotology/osqp-eigen/pull/122
* Resolved Compilation error when using float by @voldien in https://github.com/robotology/osqp-eigen/pull/123
* Test osqp-eigen with float and doubles by @GiulioRomualdi in https://github.com/robotology/osqp-eigen/pull/124
* Fix simple warnings  by @k2shah in https://github.com/robotology/osqp-eigen/pull/125
* solver: add function to get objective value by @fabinsch in https://github.com/robotology/osqp-eigen/pull/126

## New Contributors
* @mhubii made their first contribution in https://github.com/robotology/osqp-eigen/pull/117
* @voldien made their first contribution in https://github.com/robotology/osqp-eigen/pull/123
* @k2shah made their first contribution in https://github.com/robotology/osqp-eigen/pull/125
* @fabinsch made their first contribution in https://github.com/robotology/osqp-eigen/pull/126

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/robotology/osqp-eigen/compare/v0.7.0...v0.8.0

name: osqp-eigen v0.7.0
body:
# osqp-eigen v0.7.0 (2022-01-10) Release Notes

## What's Changed
* Add conda-forge references in the README.md by @GiulioRomualdi in https://github.com/robotology/osqp-eigen/pull/100
* Correct typo in  `OsqpEigen::Solver::solve` @KexianShen in https://github.com/robotology/osqp-eigen/pull/104
* Introduce `Status` and `ErrorExitFlag` enum class that replicates the content of https://osqp.org/docs/interfaces/status_values.html by @GiulioRomualdi in https://github.com/robotology/osqp-eigen/pull/111
* Deprecate `OsqpEigen::Solver::solve` in favour of `OsqpEigen::Solver::solveProblem` by @GiulioRomualdi in https://github.com/robotology/osqp-eigen/pull/111
* Implement `OsqpEigen::Solver::getStatus`to get the internal state of `osqp` solver by @GiulioRomualdi in https://github.com/robotology/osqp-eigen/pull/111
* Move from LGPL to BSD3 by @GiulioRomualdi in https://github.com/robotology/osqp-eigen/pull/112
* Fix typo, add getGradient, add package.xml to build in catkin workspaces by @wxmerkt in https://github.com/robotology/osqp-eigen/pull/109

## New Contributors
* @KexianShen made their first contribution in https://github.com/robotology/osqp-eigen/pull/104
* @wxmerkt made their first contribution in https://github.com/robotology/osqp-eigen/pull/109

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/robotology/osqp-eigen/compare/v0.6.4...v0.7.0

name: osqp-eigen v0.6.4 (2021-06-16)
body:
# osqp-eigen v0.6.4 (2021-06-16) Release Notes

This version is compatible with [osqp v0.6.2](https://github.com/oxfordcontrol/osqp/releases/tag/v0.6.2).

## Fix 
- Fix OsqpEigen::Data::setUpperBound error message (https://github.com/robotology/osqp-eigen/pull/95)

## Changed 
- Move from Doxygen documentation to m.css  (https://github.com/robotology/osqp-eigen/pull/94)
- Now cmake 3.8 is required (https://github.com/robotology/osqp-eigen/pull/91)
- Update the InstallBasicPackageFiles cmake file (https://github.com/robotology/osqp-eigen/pull/99)

## Contributors
This is a list of people that contributed to this release (generated from the git history using `git shortlog -ens --no-merges v0.6.3..v0.6.4`):
```
     4  Giulio Romualdi
     1  Silvio Traversaro
     1  Stefano Dafarra 
```

name: osqp-eigen v0.6.3 (2021-03-26)
body:
# osqp-eigen v0.6.3 (2021-03-26) Release Notes

This version is compatible with [osqp v0.6.2](https://github.com/oxfordcontrol/osqp/releases/tag/v0.6.2).

## Added 
- Implement Data::setBounds() method (https://github.com/robotology/osqp-eigen/pull/83)
- Add option for enabling/disabling debug error output to cerr (https://github.com/robotology/osqp-eigen/pull/75)

## Changed 
- Check if the solver is initialized in some methods of the Solver class (https://github.com/robotology/osqp-eigen/pull/89)

## Deprecated
- `setMaxIteraction` in favour  `setMaxIteration` (https://github.com/robotology/osqp-eigen/pull/78)

## Contributors
This is a list of people that contributed to this release (generated from the git history using `git shortlog -ens --no-merges v0.6.2..v0.6.3`):
```
10  Giulio Romualdi 
8  Karl Ljungkvist 
```

name: osqp-eigen v0.6.2 (2020-06-09)
body:
# osqp-eigen v0.6.2 (2020-06-09) Release Notes

This version is compatible with osqp v0.6.0 (https://github.com/oxfordcontrol/osqp/commit/66e878a3e4720a05e673e27a45668116db95ebed)

## Added
* Automatic generation of the `Doxygen` documentation #65 
* The `osqp` workspace can be retrieved #63
* Check that all the settings are actually available #52
* `Valgrind` tests #48

## Removed
* Some depracted functions have been remove #48

## Changed
* Bugfix in the solver initialization when updating hessian and constraint matrix #64 
* Properly exporting Eigen dependency #62
* Forcing the input `Eigen matrix` to be `csc` when copying it into an `osqp` matrix #57
* Move from `Travis` and `Appveyor` to `GitHub actions` for continuous integration  #30
* Move from `google test` to `catch2`  #59

## Contributors
This is a list of people that contributed to this release (generated from the git history using `git shortlog -ens --no-merges v0.5.2..v0.6.2`):
- 27  Giulio Romualdi @GiulioRomualdi 
- 12  Stefano Dafarra @S-Dafarra 
- 2  Tomoki Anzai @chibi314 
- 1  Matthew Powelson @mpowelson

name: osqp-eigen v0.5.2 (2020-01-30)
body:
# osqp-eigen v0.5.2 (2020-01-30) Release Notes

This version is compatible with osqp v0.6.0

## Changes
* link `osqp` as `public` library (i.e. the consumer library/application can avoid to link `osqp`)
* export `osqp` as depency
* make `osqp-eigen` compatible with `osqp v0.6.0`

## Contributors
This is a list of people that contributed to this release (generated from the git history using `git shortlog -ens --no-merges v0.4.1..v0.5.2`):
```
10 Giulio Romualdi
```

name: osqp-eigen v0.4.1 (2019-09-23)
body:
# osqp-eigen v0.4.1 (2019-09-23) Release Notes

This version is **NOT** compatible with `osqp v0.6.0`

## Changes
* move `OsqpEigen.h` inside `include/OsqpEigen` folder 
* add the possibility to build the tests folder as an external package
* the methods setUpperBound `setLowerBound` `setGradient` `updateUpperBound` `updateLowerBound` `updateGradient` are no more template functions.
* the methods related to the sparse matrices take as input an `Eigen::SparseCompressedBased` object instead of `Eigen::SparseMatrix`.
* now it is possible to pass an `Eigen::Map` to the function instead of an `Eigen::MatrixXd`


## Contributors
This is a list of people that contributed to this release (generated from the git history using `git shortlog -ens --no-merges v0.3.1..v0.4.1`):
```
8 Giulio Romualdi
```

name: osqp-eigen v0.3.1 (2019-09-23)
body:
# osqp-eigen v0.3.1 (2019-09-23) Release Notes

This version is **NOT** compatible with `osqp v0.6.0`

## Changes
* handle different version of `osqp-eigen` in `CMakeLists.txt`


## Contributors
This is a list of people that contributed to this release (generated from the git history using `git shortlog -ens --no-merges v0.3.0..v0.3.1`):
```

```

name: osqp-eigen v0.3.0 (2019-04-15)
body:
# osqp-eigen v0.3.0 (2019-04-15) Release Notes

The first implementation of the `osqp-eigen` library. 

## New features 
* Implementation of the `OsqpEigen::Solver` class: main wrapper of the [`osqp workspace`](https://osqp.org/docs/interfaces/cc++#_CPPv413OSQPWorkspace)
* Implementation of the  `OsqpEigen::Data` class: it is a wrapper of [`osqp data`](https://osqp.org/docs/interfaces/cc++#_CPPv48OSQPData) struct
* Implementation of the  `OsqpEigen::Settings` class: it contains all the settings defined in [`osqp settings`](https://osqp.org/docs/interfaces/cc++#_CPPv412OSQPSettings) struct
## Contributors
This is a list of people that contributed to this release (generated from the git history using `git shortlog -ens --no-merges v0.3.0`):
```
58  Giulio Romualdi
15  Stefano Dafarra
```
